desc: Pest Control training videos for pest management professionals. Broadcast quality video training for in-house or personal training. Practical in the field training programs that focus on real world pest management.

layout.text:
“The Pests of Your Life” Mini’s (16 DVDs)
Practical Pest Management (6 DVDs)
THE CHALLENGE II (12 DVDs)
That’s a total of 34 Training Programs!
